Reviews.Title: Review of the HP Laptop Elitebook 6930p-Core 2 Duo 2.53ghz -2gb Ram -160gb HardDrive
Reviews.Author: Rachel R. Anderson
Reviews.Content: In spite of all the scams and viruses out there that made the computer sick, It kept ongoing and right now it is getting fixed. It is a very strong running machine. In the future I will need a good anti-virus software that doesn't cost me too much.

Reviews.Title: Good working machine
Reviews.Author: Dauan
Reviews.Content: Everything was as it suppose to be. The screen isn't very bright or I would have given 5 stars, but good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core 2 Duo 2.53Ghz
2GB DDR2
160GB SATA hard drive
DVDRW
Windows 7 Home Premium 64bit
ProductInfo.Name: Hp Laptop Elitebook 6930p - Core 2 Duo 2.53ghz - 2gb RAM - 160gb Hard Drive - Dvdrw - Windows 7 Home Premium 64bit
